rows.label: bf07110150_0010
rows.name: What IS this?

rows.label: bf07110150_0020
rows.name: This is Genbu's ether flow.

rows.label: bf07110150_0030
rows.name:
The Divine Beast ingests the Cloud Sea
and uses it as a source of energy.

rows.label: bf07110150_0040
rows.name:
This energy flows throughout the Divine
Beast's body in the form of ether.

rows.label: bf07110150_0050
rows.name:
Refining and crystallizing this
ether creates Core Chips.

rows.label: bf07110150_0060
rows.name:
The facility downstairs is
where they're produced.

rows.label: bf07110150_0070
rows.name:
So in other words, you're siphoning away
a portion of the Divine Beast's energy.

rows.label: bf07110150_0080
rows.name:
This is the main reason why Luxuria's
temperature is low nand crops don't grow well.

rows.label: bf07110150_0090
rows.name: So that's the reason behind it.

rows.label: bf07110150_0100
rows.name:
Core Chips are essential to a nation's
energy policy and military policy.

rows.label: bf07110150_0110
rows.name: The Holy See desired this power.

rows.label: bf07110150_0120
rows.name: For what purpose?

rows.label: bf07110150_0130
rows.name: Alst at the time was in crisis.

rows.label: bf07110150_0140
rows.name:
On the other hand, it was the perfect opportunity
to expand their country's influence.

rows.label: bf07110150_0150
rows.name: So they...muscled in.

rows.label: bf07110150_0160
rows.name:
As a result, Luxuria fell into
a chronic energy shortage.

rows.label: bf07110150_0170
rows.name: The rest is as you have seen.

rows.label: bf07110150_0180
rows.name:
Due to the extreme cold,
crops don't grow.

rows.label: bf07110150_0190
rows.name:
The people of Luxuria were
forced to live in poverty...

rows.label: bf07110150_0200
rows.name: So why not just leave the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: bf07110150_0210
rows.name:
If you can move freely, wouldn't it
be better to go somewhere warmer?

rows.label: bf07110150_0220
rows.name:
They probably feared contact
with other nations.

rows.label: bf07110150_0230
rows.name:
Contact with other nations might reveal the
truth that the legend of Adel was a lie.

rows.label: bf07110150_0240
rows.name:
So that's why they
implemented isolationism.

rows.label: bf07110150_0250
rows.name: Indeed. That was five centuries ago.

rows.label: bf07110150_0260
rows.name:
Now the Holy Grail has awakened, the Holy See
is demanding we hand over the Sanctus Chain.

rows.label: bf07110150_0270
rows.name:
They said if we refused, they would
reveal Luxuria's history in detail.

rows.label: bf07110150_0280
rows.name: Acedia would... such a...

rows.label: bf07110150_0290
rows.name:
I get it now. That's what
was in that letter.

rows.label: bf07110150_0300
rows.name: I've had enough.

rows.label: bf07110150_0310
rows.name:
I cannot tolerate the people of Luxuria
suffering in poverty any further.

rows.label: bf07110150_0320
rows.name: That's why I made my decision.

rows.label: bf07110150_0330
rows.name: So Homura...

rows.label: bf07110150_0340
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf07110150_0350
rows.name:
Heaven's Holy Grail could potentially
be used as the Holy See's sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0360
rows.name:
But if we could seal away that power,
we might be able to resist them.

rows.label: bf07110150_0370
rows.name:
By escaping from our current way of life, the sins
of the royal family might surely be forgiven.

rows.label: bf07110150_0380
rows.name:
Didn't you think about using
the Holy Grail's power?

rows.label: bf07110150_0390
rows.name: It's a power beyond our capacity.

rows.label: bf07110150_0400
rows.name:
I know very well that we
lack the qualification.

rows.label: bf07110150_0410
rows.name: But is that true for you as well?

rows.label: bf07110150_0420
rows.name:
I felt something. When I
looked in your eyes, I knew.

rows.label: bf07110150_0430
rows.name:
Perhaps you are the one to whom we
can entrust the Holy Grail's power.

rows.label: bf07110150_0440
rows.name: Father...

rows.label: bf07110150_0450
rows.name:
But in the end, I only
made things worse,

rows.label: bf07110150_0460
rows.name: because of my shallow thinking.

rows.label: bf07110150_0470
rows.name:
This book contains writings
about the hero Adel.

rows.label: bf07110150_0480
rows.name:
According to this, Adel saved the world
from destruction using a white sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0490
rows.name:
It is written that he disappeared
together with a red sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0500
rows.name: White and red...

rows.label: bf07110150_0505
rows.name: It must mean Hikari and Homura's swords.

rows.label: bf07110150_0510
rows.name:
The author of this book was
probably someone close to Adel.

rows.label: bf07110150_0520
rows.name: And most curiously...

rows.label: bf07110150_0530
rows.name:
After Adel disappeared, the author of
this book went looking for something.

rows.label: bf07110150_0540
rows.name: Something?

rows.label: bf07110150_0550
rows.name: The third Holy Grail sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0560
rows.name: There's a third?

rows.label: bf07110150_0570
rows.name:
It's said that the sword was transparent like
diamond and emitted a clear, brilliant light.

rows.label: bf07110150_0580
rows.name:
But throughout his life, Adel
never used this sword...

rows.label: bf07110150_0590
rows.name: No, he was unable to use it.

rows.label: bf07110150_0600
rows.name: Why didn't he use it?

rows.label: bf07110150_0610
rows.name: Even the hero Adel,

rows.label: bf07110150_0620
rows.name:
couldn't withstand its
overwhelming power, it seems.

rows.label: bf07110150_0630
rows.name:
And thus, fearing its power,
he sealed it away somewhere.

rows.label: bf07110150_0640
rows.name: And the author writes the following:

rows.label: bf07110150_0650
rows.name:
This sword is the true sword
of Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf07110150_0660
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]?!

rows.label: bf07110150_0670
rows.name:
Now, Rex. You were defeated by Shin.
Doubtless that man is a powerful warrior...

rows.label: bf07110150_0680
rows.name: But even so, can this be right?

rows.label: bf07110150_0690
rows.name:
Can the Holy Grail herself truly be
outmatched by a single opposing Blade?

rows.label: bf07110150_0700
rows.name:
Would it not make more
sense to presume...

rows.label: bf07110150_0710
rows.name:
that it's because you haven't drawn out
the full power of Heaven's Holy Grail...

rows.label: bf07110150_0720
rows.name:
You mean...I'm the one who's
been holding them back...?

rows.label: bf07110150_0730
rows.name: Your Majesty! Where is that sword?

rows.label: bf07110150_0740
rows.name: I want to get my hands on that sword.

rows.label: bf07110150_0750
rows.name:
I want to get it and
save Homura and Hikari.

rows.label: bf07110150_0760
rows.name:
Regrettably, the book does not
specify the sword's location.

rows.label: bf07110150_0770
rows.name: But there must be...

rows.label: bf07110150_0780
rows.name:
However, reading between the lines,
it seems the author suspected...

rows.label: bf07110150_0790
rows.name:
...that the sword lies somewhere
in Liberalitas Archipelago.

rows.label: bf07110150_0800
rows.name:
It will be difficult, but
if you could find it...

rows.label: bf07110150_0810
rows.name: In Liberalitas...

rows.label: bf07110150_0820
rows.name: Are you ready?

rows.label: bf07110150_0830
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf07110150_0840
rows.name:
I'm asking if you're prepared
to become her true Driver.

rows.label: bf07110150_0860
rows.name: Gramps?

rows.label: bf07110150_0870
rows.name: Well? Are you, Rex?

rows.label: bf07110150_0880
rows.name: Of course I am. Isn't that obvious?

rows.label: bf07110150_0890
rows.name:
I want to become the true
Driver of Homura and Hikari.

rows.label: bf07110150_0900
rows.name: And then take the two of them to Eden.

rows.label: bf07110150_0910
rows.name:
Then come with me. I'll
show you the way.

rows.label: bf07110150_0920
rows.name: Zeke.

rows.label: bf07110150_0930
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: bf07110150_0940
rows.name: I have a request for you, as king.

rows.label: bf07110150_0950
rows.name:
Well, that's unusual.
Wonders never cease.

rows.label: bf07110150_0960
rows.name:
I stand corrected. It's
already happening.

rows.label: bf07110150_0970
rows.name: The Holy Grail needs...

rows.label: bf07110150_0980
rows.name:
No, I want to appoint you
as that boy's guardian.

rows.label: bf07110150_0990
rows.name: You mean Rex?

rows.label: bf07110150_1000
rows.name:
Yes. I saw...something,
in that boy's eyes.

rows.label: bf07110150_1010
rows.name: A light that must...never go out.

rows.label: bf07110150_1020
rows.name:
You've really taken a
liking to him, huh?

rows.label: bf07110150_1030
rows.name: Alright, leave it to me.

rows.label: bf07110150_1040
rows.name: I'm counting on you...

rows.label: bf07110150_1050
rows.name:
Well, I was planning to do
that from the start anyway.
